meanings.definition: A type of alcohol found in citronella oil.
meanings.sent1: Citronellols are natural compounds that give citronella oil its distinct scent.
meanings.sent2: I bought a bottle of citronella oil containing citronellols to keep mosquitoes away.
meanings.sent3: The citronellols in the oil whispered to the mosquitoes, 'Stay away from me!'
meanings.sent4: The citronellols danced in the air, creating a protective barrier against insects.
meanings.sent5: As I inhaled the citronella oil, the citronellols seemed to sing a sweet melody of repelling bugs.
